p: According to incomplete statistics, there have been more than 300 epidemics recorded in China's history. [ 13] In the struggles against epidemics over thousands of years, many methods have been proved effective in practice. [ 14] Traditional Chinese medicine plays an extremely important role in the processes. Studies have shown that Artemisiae Argyi Folium, Atractylodis Rhizoma and Radix Angelicae Dahuricae were used for prevention of plagues by Chinese ancients. [ 14] Peking University Shenzhen Hospital utilized an air disinfection technique combined atractylodus fumigate with chemical and physical disinfectants, leading to a no nosocomial infection report in the fight against SARS in 2003. [ 15] Existing studies applaud the application of Chinese herbal medicine fumigation in clinical practices, and there are pharmacological studies confirmed its active ingredients. [ 16, 17] Chinese herbal medicine provides a new way for the combat to current severe COVID-19.
